lenders.name: R.D.
lenders.loan_because: Others will be given an opportunity that many Americans take for granted!

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: "I am not an Athenian or a Greek, but a citizen of the world."                                                                                 ~Socrates

lenders.name: linda
lenders.loan_because: I think it is wonderful to stretch out a helping hand across the miles.  I live in a land of plenty, others are far less fortunate.  Kiva is a fantastic concept.

lenders.name: David with friends
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and I like this concept.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: It seems an easy way to reach out to people I'll never meet.
lenders.occupational_info: Working to give people knowledge and helping others bring their wisdom to decisions.

lenders.name: Makeva
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a profound difference in the life of someone who truly needs a blessing!  Independence is such a great gift!

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled the world extensively, and believe in the inspirational power of  education+investment  as a means to help people help themselves.  I was further inspired by Muhammad Yunus winning the Nobel Prize for micro-lending at his Grameen Bank.  Kiva enables me to invest in this same global "cycle of opportunity" on a personal basis.
lenders.occupational_info: High Tech Marketing.

lenders.name: Achim
lenders.loan_because: let other have part of my good luck in my life.

lenders.name: Bradley
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to know that I can actually make some kind of connection with people in different parts of the world. I'd like to help folks make things happen that create positive change.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach doctors how to use computers to help their patients

lenders.name: suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help ease the burden of hard working mothers who just want to see their families grow up healthy and happy.
lenders.occupational_info: It's very rewarding to make people happy by serving them a wonderful meals  and making. their evening a memorable one.

lenders.name: Stanley
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who help themselves.

lenders.name: Tamara
lenders.occupation: Program Specialist at International Education org.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate for what I have accomplished in life as a single mother, and I want to help others accomplish their goals in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist scientists at my academic institution to manage conflicts of interest for cutting edge work in research that may someday change the face of world medicine.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I plan events and bring locals together to support the arts.

lenders.name: cynthia
lenders.loan_because: My life is blessed and it's time to share my good fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who are mentally ill and need someone to help them recover their lives.

lenders.name: Adrienne
lenders.loan_because: I love to see people suceed  in their lives and be an example for their children to follow.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a school

lenders.name: Caleb & Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because:
We are both very excited to help other people achieve the dream of financial success through owning your own business.  We are working towards this financial goal ourselves - currently we both have jobs where we work 40 hours per week and in addition, we have our own business outside of that - we have bought several apartments that we rent to students and young adults.  We are excited to hear about both the struggles and the successes from other people around the world who also own their own businesses.  

We also love to be connected to people from outside our country - we travel a lot and have also lived abroad for a couple months.  Thank you so much for the opportunity to get to know you and your business!
lenders.occupational_info:
During the daytime Monday-Friday we are both mechanical engineers.  Caleb helps design the manufacturing equipment that creates incredibly sharp razor blades for the Gillette Company.  

Elizabeth works in a "consultancy" business designing products.  The way this business works is that different companies big and small looking for new ideas ask her to design new and innovative products for them.  Elizabeth has designed a medical injector for a drug called insulin which is used in treating diabetes. She has also designed a tool for use in the kitchen, and a door knob that is very easy for older people to use.  

After work, Caleb and Elizabeth manage and maintain their properties that they rent to 10 people.

lenders.name: John & Mitzi
lenders.loan_because: I like being able to see who will benefit from the loan and what will become of the money.
lenders.occupational_info:
I earn money from selling computers and telephone headsets to businesses in the UK and when I'm not doing that I'm usually playing a guitar.

Mitzi would rather be playing.

lenders.name: Tracy Hansel
lenders.occupational_info: Tax Attorney

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.occupation: advocate for women with postpartum depression
lenders.loan_because: I love being able to support mothers who have become entrepreneurs in order to support their families.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: It helps get people out of poverty

lenders.name: Pete
lenders.loan_because: I have so much to be thankful for in my own life. The least I can do is help others who haven't had the same kind of opportunities I have had. But I know that just giving money away isn't necessarily going to make a long term difference for people. Helping them get a fresh start on an enterprise that they will invest their own vision and effort in can make a real difference. And if I make loans, I get to help people this way over and over again!

lenders.name: Catie
lenders.loan_because: it takes so little to do so much

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: we all have the means to do good

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: Becasue I can, it seems like it could do some good, and it makes me feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for IBM contracted to support computers and network for Schneider Electric. The factories I support produce electrical boxes and transformers.

lenders.name: Glynda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help woman in particular to become independent, sucessful and have some say in the direction of their lives and the size of their families. I am also very concerned about the impact the lack of clean water has on children's health.
lenders.occupational_info: I own an evironmental and food testing laboratory

lenders.name: Gloria Dei
lenders.loan_because: 1 John 3:16-18  "We know love by this, that he laid down his life for us - and we ought to lay down our lives for one another. How does God’s love abide in anyone who has the world’s goods and sees a brother or sister in need and yet refuses help? Little children, let us love, not in word or speech, but in truth and action." (NRSV)
lenders.occupational_info: We are Christian teenagers.  We wanted to help others through kiva loans, so we held a Christmas carnival for the younger children in our church.  We played games, painted faces, watched movies, and did craft projects.  The money we raised is being used to make these loans.  See our congregation's website at http://www.gloriadeinorthbrook.org.  The link below contains a world map of our loans.

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: I work a lot, so in terms of sharing with others, I have more money than time.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with academic libraries to improve their operations.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: 1) Prosperity is a precursor to peace. 2) Entreprenuership is the backbone of prosperity. 3) It takes money to make money. 4) And everyone should have the opportunity to live the "American Dream", even if its in another part of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I evaluate stocks for investment funds.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.occupational_info: I create and edit policy and procedure manuals and documents.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: We can.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: I believe strongly that people helping people from across the globe can help unite the world in peace.  As long as I am able, I feel it my responsibility to be a part of that peace.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach orchestra (violin, viola, cello and bass) to children ages 9-18 in public school.  They choose to take my class because they want to learn how to play those instruments and enjoy making music together.  It is a great job!

lenders.name: Cher-Ron
lenders.occupation: Single Hardworking mother who is an Idea generator

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: Why not?

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: I believe that 'sharing the wealth' and capitalism aren't mutually exclusive concepts.  (Go Obama!)
lenders.occupational_info: A healthy democracy requires an informed citizenry -- through my work I help people understand the world around them and make smarter decisions.

lenders.name: General Gordon Elementary
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we have excess money that other people need more than we do.  We are from one of the richest countries in the world and we feel that we have more money than we really need.  Our teacher does not want gifts at holidays so we donate to Kiva instead.
lenders.occupational_info: We are learning to be citizens of the world.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a small non-profit organization who has been bringing classical musicians to perform concerts in this rural area for 27 years...music is good for the soul and makes people happy.  We also provide music programs in local classrooms...we want our children to be happy too!

lenders.name: Xing
lenders.loan_because: This seems like a worthwhile cause. It feels good to do so little and potentially change someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the video game industry.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I admire their determination and spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Women's Business Enterprise Council South, an organization for women business owners interested in promoting, developing and maintaining business relationships with other women business owners, major corporations and governmental agencies.

lenders.name: Lori , Don, Diane & Bud

lenders.occupational_info: I work in the software industry managing teams. I  like to think that I am able to help my team perform their best work.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.occupation: Marketing for a news syndication comp

lenders.loan_because: We want to help others get a chance at a better life.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: without the generosity of friends and strangers, I would not be in the position to give back to others in need today.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to students from around the world who want to study in the United States and realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I am able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I live free or die.

lenders.name: Dustin
lenders.loan_because: Because we all need a helping hand every once and a while.
lenders.occupational_info: I help College students find jobs within the company I work for and help get them set-up on their path in life.

lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by the industry of those seeking the loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to learn things to improve the health of people.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I wish to enrich the lives of others and provide hope to families that have a desire to improve their lives through work and dedication.

lenders.name: Pejman
lenders.loan_because:
Jesus died for my sins.

 If you declare with your mouth, “Jesus is Lord,” and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved. For it is with your heart that you believe and are justified, and it is with your mouth that you profess your faith and are saved. -Romans 10:9-10
lenders.occupational_info:
Dear God in heaven, I come to you in the name of Jesus. I acknowledge to You that I am a sinner, and I am sorry for my sins and the life that I have lived; I need your forgiveness.

I believe that your only begotten Son Jesus Christ shed His precious blood on the cross at Calvary and died for my sins, and I am now willing to turn from my sin.

You said in Your Holy Word, Romans 10:9 that if we confess the Lord our God and believe in our hearts that God raised Jesus from the dead, we shall be saved.

Right now I confess Jesus as the Lord of my soul. With my heart, I believe that God raised Jesus from the dead. This very moment I accept Jesus Christ as my own personal Savior and according to His Word, right now I am saved.

Thank you Jesus for your unlimited grace which has saved me from my sins. I thank you Jesus that your grace never leads to license, but rather it always leads to repentance. Therefore Lord Jesus transform my life so that I may bring glory and honor to you alone and not to myself.

Thank you Jesus for dying for me and giving me eternal life.

Amen.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I've travelled to remote areas of Asia and see both the fine qualities of mountain people everywhere, as well as the need for financial aid with a personal touch.
lenders.occupational_info: I grow vegetables for my community, and teach people how to look after our wild areas and mountains.

lenders.loan_because: Like everyone else I feel the need to share.. :) Thanks KIVA  for creating this great tool to reach out and be of assistance to someone even across the globe.

They are my world.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help empower other people to live their best lives for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a hair stylist and own my own business.  I work with 8 other people to help people feel better about who they are every day.

lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.loan_because: I believe this is a hands on and direct way of helping a fellow human being help themselves.

lenders.loan_because: I know every bit helps. I do believe that you reap what you sow; therefore, I want to plant seeds in otherwise desolate grounds so others may reap a good harvest.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is what I do to make ends meet, but in the end, does not define who I am. I am a giver and my job affords me the opportunity to give to others.

lenders.loan_because: I believe the funds I can lend through KIVA go to those most worthy. As my cup is overflowing so can I share.

lenders.name: brian
lenders.loan_because: i party

lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time student at Brigham Young University as well as the Co-Founder of a nonprofit organization called Musana Jewelry which helps women in Lugazi, Uganda through jewelry production in Uganda and selling the products in America.

lenders.loan_because: All people matter and are our clients. In our world, we always put our clients first.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a boring government worker.

lenders.occupational_info: leading classes at my church and other organizations as a volunteer

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: When I first read about Kiva in the newspaper, I thought it was a novel idea, and I love the fact that my donations are actual loans--not handouts--that will encourage responsible entrepreneurs around the world to push themselves to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in various crew positions on independent motion pictures, and also write original movie scripts.  I am interested in working on small productions that otherwise could not compete with the large movie studios.  I'm all for "the little guy."

lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate for all I have and would like to make an impact in someone else's life

lenders.name: Hello
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes the process of helping others so easy.  The small donation I make can help someone in a big way.  The Kiva loan recipients are people wanting to do something for themselves, to make a difference in their own lives.  I've always wanted to start my own business and this is my way of helping someone else with those same goals.

lenders.name: Steven and AyJy
lenders.loan_because: We want to support microfinance, and it makes sense for us to put aside some savings for a few months at a time.

lenders.name: Brick
lenders.loan_because: I feel people deserve my support in building a better life for themselves and the people around them.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a musician and a writer. I try to spread happiness through the results of my creativity.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: My first loan was made by redeeming a gift certificate. With this gift I want to keep giving and to make a difference wherever Ican.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a book publishing company. I work on a team that develops books that help people improve their lives and to reach their potential. I hope this small loan helps improve your life and the lives of those where you live.

lenders.name: Tu L
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people around the world.

lenders.name: C.J. Buenischke
lenders.loan_because: Micro-financing is the way to independence.  Why do banks have the biggest, fanciest buildings in every major city of the world?  Why do we bail them out when get into financial trouble?  Why do their top employees continue to make millions?  Kiva is a way to bypass this system.

lenders.name: The Wetzel Family
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: We are starting our own little farm and plan to add dairy goats, laying hens, pigs, more fruit trees, bigger vegetable gardens, edible landscaping, honeybees....

lenders.name: Blueyedkaren
lenders.loan_because: I love knowing that such a small donation on my part can be used to make such a difference to others. The cumulative donations of everyone giving to Kiva are working to change the world.

lenders.loan_because: Loaning to others is a way of giving a hand of friendship
lenders.occupational_info: I was a Rural Mail Carrier delivering mail to rural communities in Iowa,  USA

lenders.name: Bert
lenders.loan_because: I can & it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Robert and Bambi
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed in our lives and wish to share that with others.

lenders.name: NW Dee
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others
lenders.occupational_info: My day job helps me fund what I truly love to do and that is all things photography, taking pictures of our world, people and places.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: It is a small but effective way to help someone get ahead.  I have lived in Eastern Europe and admire the work ethic and family devotion I have witnessed there.
lenders.occupational_info: I do various things - part time librarian, part time consultant, world traveler etc.

lenders.name: Ali
lenders.loan_because: It helps people less fortunate than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: Operate spacecraft and make sure they don't break, or damage something else.

lenders.name: itaru
lenders.occupation: retired and waiting for going to paradise

lenders.occupational_info: i live in a small town in japan.and now, i feel to become  a member  of global community thanks to kiva's network

lenders.name: Yoko
lenders.loan_because: I love positive people.

lenders.name: julia
lenders.loan_because: My brother gave me a gift certificate for Christmas, and I was excited to be able to help someone across the world in such a simple and direct way. What a great idea. Thank you, Kiva for making this work.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to immigrant children who have moved to America from a variety of different countries.

lenders.name: Jeannene Langford
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone has a unique gift to offer the world. Through my KIva loans I hope to create an opportunity for others to develop their "gifts".
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an artist. It's as simple as hoping to make the world more beautiful as well as inspire creativity. 
I create art and develop product for companies world wide. I work with manufacturers that license the rights to use my art for their products. I develop art for everything from greeting cards, table top, craft products to wall art.  Please check out my blog for what I am working on currently. www.jeannenelangford.com/blog

lenders.name: Hugh
lenders.loan_because: it is an easy way to have a "Do Good." impact on the world around me.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small businessmen and non-profit organizations market themselves in cost-effective methods, with a particular focus on online marketing.

lenders.name: Jeannene
lenders.loan_because: I would like to try and make a difference in the world for someone less fortunate and who is prepared to help themselves. I am very privledged to travel the world and have seen some struggling families.
lenders.occupational_info: Jeannene works in sales for Qantas Airways along with managing and marketing my sister's art gallery, Cascade Print Room. I love  travel, animals and the arts

lenders.name: Felicity
lenders.loan_because: I love women entrepreneurs, probably because I can relate to them. I am very inspired by these women. They remind me what I am doing – working to support my family. Working because that’s what people do.
lenders.occupational_info: I love the creativity and adventure of business.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me so abundantly that I want to be able to bless others.  I also like the concept of teaching others to fish, rather than just giving them a fish.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm privilaged to take care of three of the most awesome blessings I have ever received in my life every day.  My children are an inspiration & a joy.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: I need to put up money to build my own photocopier and food business near schools in our area
lenders.occupational_info: I got axed recently after our account collapsed but i see tremendous potential in putting up my own photocopier and food business.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: Successful entrepreneurs make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Bart
lenders.loan_because: I feel this is a very good initiative

lenders.name: Koji
lenders.loan_because: I wanna do something  for someone else who wanna change their lives.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I am able to, and because I believe better access to banking and loans will enable people in the developing world to shape their own future.
